description: Sexual indifference: the system is present but offline—brakes engaged, attention slides away, and the body refuses to offer traction. Style note: consider adding category 'sexual_disinterest' to distinguish low-libido shutdown from general fatigue/numbness.
actor_description: It’s like reaching for a signal and finding static. My body stays neutral—no pull, no sexual urge, no forward lean—just a quiet blank where interest should be. The more I check for a response, the more it doesn’t show up, and my attention drifts off on its own. I feel the brakes set without drama, a flat certainty: not now, not this.
description_text: {actor} seems politely absent from the moment—gaze sliding away, posture uninviting without being tense. Their responses flatten, like a switch has been turned to “neutral,” and they disengage rather than lean in.

prerequisites.failure_message: Requires high sexual_indifference with very low sexualArousal, low/flat engagement and arousal, and low-to-neutral threat. Caps active desire (lust/passion/sexual_confidence) and caps aroused_with_shame so this reads as neutral shutdown, not avoidance or repulsion. Triggers on a meaningful rise in indifference to avoid spam.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: Their voice goes a touch more matter-of-fact—shorter answers, fewer warm inflections—like they’re switching to a purely practical register.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: There’s a sense of distance in their body: minimal lean-in, no searching contact, movements that stay contained and non-inviting.
alternate_descriptions.limited: {actor} disengages, affect flattening into a neutral, uninterested calm.
